mapper.sql: LAND_SQ, SALE_TYPE, ADDRESS, BUILDING_NAME, BUILDING_NUMBER, AREA, PRICE, FLOOR, FLOOR_SIZE, ROOM_COUNT, BATHROOM_COUNT, LIVEABLE_DATE, MEMO, SALESMAN, SALESMAN_CONTACT, DATE_FORMAT(CREATION_DATETIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS CREATION_DATETIME, DATE_FORMAT(MODIFICATION_DATETIME, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS MODIFICATION_DATETIME, SALE_STATE
mapper.select: /* landDao.selectLandList */ SELECT FROM LANDS WHERE SALE_STATE = "SALE" ORDER BY MODIFICATION_DATETIME DESC
/* landDao.selectBoughtLandList */ SELECT FROM LANDS WHERE SALE_STATE = "SALE" AND SALE_TYPE = "BUY" ORDER BY MODIFICATION_DATETIME DESC
/* landDao.selectLeasedLandList */ SELECT FROM LANDS WHERE SALE_STATE = "SALE" AND SALE_TYPE = "LEASE" ORDER BY MODIFICATION_DATETIME DESC
/* landDao.selectRentedLandList */ SELECT FROM LANDS WHERE SALE_STATE = "SALE" AND SALE_TYPE = "RENT" ORDER BY MODIFICATION_DATETIME DESC
mapper.insert: /* landDao.insertLand */ INSERT INTO LANDS ( SALE_TYPE, ADDRESS, BUILDING_NAME, BUILDING_NUMBER, AREA, PRICE, FLOOR, FLOOR_SIZE, ROOM_COUNT, BATHROOM_COUNT, LIVEABLE_DATE, MEMO, SALESMAN, SALESMAN_CONTACT, SALE_STATE ) VALUES ( #{saleType}, #{address}, #{buildingName}, #{buildingNumber}, #{area}, #{price}, #{floor}, #{floorSize}, #{roomCount}, #{bathroomCount}, STR_TO_DATE(#{liveableDate}, '%Y-%m-%d'), #{memo}, #{salesman}, #{salesmanContact}, #{saleState} )
mapper.update: /* landDao.insertLand */ UPDATE LANDS SET SALE_TYPE = #{saleType}, ADDRESS = #{address}, BUILDING_NAME = #{buildingName}, BUILDING_NUMBER = #{buildingNumber}, AREA = #{area}, PRICE = #{price}, FLOOR = #{floor}, FLOOR_SIZE = #{floorSize}, ROOM_COUNT = #{roomCount}, BATHROOM_COUNT = #{bathroomCount}, LIVEABLE_DATE = STR_TO_DATE(#{liveableDate}, '%Y-%m-%d'), MEMO = #{memo}, SALESMAN = #{salesman}, SALESMAN_CONTACT = #{salesmanContact}, MODIFICATION_DATETIME = NOW() WHERE LAND_SQ = #{landSq}
